name: Covering Fire
description:
Do not attack. On this unit’s phase, target ally within this unit’s normal bow range. The following reaction can be used for one turn, at the cost of 3 SP per use.

Trigger: foe initiates combat with target ally at Range > 1. Target that foe (apply range penalty if needed) and initiate combat against target foe. On hit, apply @{const:gbp:[Mt -5]} to target foe until the end of target foe’s next combat. Cannot make follow-up attacks.
